title: Genetic study of impulsiveness reveals associations with psychiatric disorders

title_detail.value: Genetic study of impulsiveness reveals associations with psychiatric disorders

summary: Impulsiveness and substance use share a genetic basis, according to genome-wide association studies. With more than 20,000 participants, the research represents the largest genetic analysis of impulsive personality traits to date.

summary_detail.value: Impulsiveness and substance use share a genetic basis, according to genome-wide association studies. With more than 20,000 participants, the research represents the largest genetic analysis of impulsive personality traits to date.
